entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
